class selector.composition.ComposedSelector(selectors: List[AbstractSelector], directory='./', *args, **kwargs)¶

Perform several selections consecutively.

Working directory.

Note

When setting directory, info_fpath would be set as well.

selector.cur module¶

selector.cur.cur_selection(features, num: int, zeta: float = 2, strategy: str = 'descent', rng=<module 'numpy.random' from '/Users/jyxu/miniconda3/envs/aiida/lib/python3.7/site-packages/numpy/random/__init__.py'>)¶

Performa a CUR selection.

Parameters

  • features – A (nframes,nfeatures) shaped arrray.

  • num – Selected number.

  • zeta – Exponential coefficient.

  • strategy – Selection strategy, either stochastic or descent.

  • rng – Random generator.

selector.cur.descriptor_svd(at_descs, num: int, do_vectors='vh')¶

Perfrom a sparse SVD.

selector.selector module¶

class selector.selector.AbstractSelector(directory=PosixPath('/Users/jyxu/Documents/SomeCodes/GDPy/docs'), *args, **kwargs)¶

Bases: ABC

The base class of any selector.

Return a dict of selector parameters.

Default parameters.

Working directory.

Note

When setting directory, info_fpath would be set as well.

property fname¶
indent: int = 0¶

Indent of outputs.

logger = None¶

Logger instance.

name: str = 'abstract'¶

Selector name.

njobs¶

Number of parallel jobs for joblib.

pfunc(content, *args, **kwargs)¶

Write outputs to file.

select(frames: List[Atoms], index_map: Optional[List[int]] = None, ret_indices: bool = False, *args, **kargs) → Union[List[Atoms], List[int]]¶

Seelect frames.

Based on used selction protocol

Parameters

  • frames – A list of ase.Atoms.

  • index_map – Global indices of frames.

  • ret_indices – Whether return selected indices or frames.

  • *args – Variable length argument list.

  • **kwargs – Arbitrary keyword arguments.

Returns

selected results

Return type

List[Atoms] or List[int]

selector.uncertainty module¶

class selector.uncertainty.DeviationSelector(directory='./', pot_worker: Optional[AbstractWorker] = None, *args, **kwargs)¶

Bases: AbstractSelector

Selection based on property uncertainty.

Note

The property values should be stored in atoms.info.

default_parameters: dict = {'criteria': {'max_devi_e': [0.01, 0.25], 'max_devi_f': [0.05, 0.5]}}¶

Default parameters.

name: str = 'devi'¶

Selector name.

pot_worker¶

A worker for potential computations.

Module contents¶

selector.create_selector(input_list: List[dict], directory: Union[str, Path] = PosixPath('/Users/jyxu/Documents/SomeCodes/GDPy/docs'), pot_worker: Optional[AbstractWorker] = None) → AbstractSelector¶

Create a selector based on arguments.

Parameters

  • input_list – A list of each selector’s parameters.

  • directory – Working directory.

  • pot_worker – A worker for potential computations.

Returns

An instance of the AbstractSelector.
